citations.narrative:
There are some sharp edges on the tin shield below the water nipple in four enclosures. The tin shields with sharp
edges must be repaired or replaced to prevent injury to the guinea pigs.
Correct by February 8, 2014
An exit briefing was conducted with owner.

narrative:
3.28(a)(1)
PRIMARY ENCLOSURES. 
There are some sharp edges on the tin shield below the water nipple in four enclosures. The tin shields with sharp
edges must be repaired or replaced to prevent injury to the guinea pigs.
Correct by February 8, 2014
An exit briefing was conducted with owner.
